meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jill Staunton Terry Hanlon Gavin Borchert Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7574.

td.p: Jill Staunton, an office associate from Springfield, Illinois
Terry Hanlon, a graduate student from Charlottesville, Virginia
Gavin Borchert, a writer and editor from Seattle, Washington (whose 1-day cash winnings total $19,600)

tr.td: WE'RE TALKING BASEBALL
AVIAN POETRY
3 DIMENSIONAL
WEBBY AWARD WINNERS
ARGUMENT
"-ED" HOMONYM

Jill
')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
